parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Map

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if map was forced by using [[forceMap]] command or [[openMap]] command with force option

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''forcedMap'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [forceMapForced, openMapForced] where:
* forceMapForced: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if map was forced with [[forceMap]] command
* openMapForced: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if map was forced with [[openMap]] command.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_forceMapForced = [[forcedMap]] [[select]] 0;
_openMapForced = [[forcedMap]] [[select]] 1;</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[openMap]], [[forceMap]], [[showMap]], [[visibleMap]], [[shownMap]]
</value></part></template>
